roleset.name: communicate

role.descr: other communicator(s), communicated with or to

example.name: Arg 1
example.text: The communication of the details of the plan took two hours.
example.arg: of the details of the plan

example.name: NP only, Arg2
example.text: concomitantly opening up channels of communications with theTigrean rebels through neighboring Sudan

example.name: Communicators as one constituent, MNR
example.text: Communication between the prisoners via tapping sounds began on Friday.

example.name: Arg0 as "from" PP, MNR
example.text: They could not act without official communication from Moscow.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: If a physicist, in her own thought and her communication with other physicists about physics, were obliged to use nothing but layman's terms, little could be said.

roleset.note: Roleset based on verb entry communicate.01, OntoNotes grouping communication-n sense 1; maps to VN classes battle-36.4-1, correspond-36.1, transfer_mesg-37.1.1. Framed by Claire.
